results.title: Effect of continuous use of metformin on kidney function in diabetes patients with acute myocardial infarction undergoing primary percutaneous coronary intervention
results.text_hl: The GIPS III trial has supported the idea that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ is safe to use after @<m>DISEASE_ST_Elevation_Myocardial_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000072657 @@@STEMI@@@ and contrast agent exposure.

citations.NLM: Yu Q, Zhu JJ, Liu WX. Effect of continuous use of metformin on kidney function in diabetes patients with acute myocardial infarction undergoing primary percutaneous coronary intervention BMC Cardiovasc Disord. 2020 Apr 21;20(1):187. PMID: 32316910

results.title: Acute, High Dose Metformin Therapy at Reperfusion Decreases Infarct Size in the High-Risk Aging Heart
results.text_hl: The administration of high dose @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in the setting of @SPECIES_9606 @@@human@@@ @<m>DISEASE_ST_Elevation_Myocardial_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000072657 @@@STEMI@@@ is potentially feasible.

results.title: Association of Circulating Ketone Bodies With Functional Outcomes After ST-Segment Elevation Myocardial Infarction.
results.text_hl: METHODS: @CHEMICAL_Ketone_Bodies @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007657 @@@KBs@@@ were measured in 369 participants from a randomized trial on early @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ therapy after @<m>DISEASE_ST_Elevation_Myocardial_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000072657 @@@STEMI@@@.

results.title: Associations of systemic oxidative stress with functional outcomes after ST-segment elevation myocardial infarction.
results.text_hl: METHODS: FTs were detected in archived serum samples from 378 participants of a neutral randomized trial on @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ therapy after @<m>DISEASE_ST_Elevation_Myocardial_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000072657 @@@STEMI@@@.

results.title: Effect of Metformin Treatment on Lipoprotein Subfractions in Non-Diabetic Patients with Acute Myocardial Infarction: A Glycometabolic Intervention as Adjunct to Primary Coronary Intervention in ST Elevation Myocardial Infarction (GIPS-III) Trial
results.text_hl: We determined whether @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ administration affects lipoprotein subfractions 4 months after @<m>DISEASE_ST_Elevation_Myocardial_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000072657 @@@ST-segment elevation MI@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_ST_Elevation_Myocardial_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000072657 @@@STEMI@@@).

results.title: Metformin and contrast-induced acute kidney injury in diabetic patients treated with primary percutaneous coronary intervention for ST segment elevation myocardial infarction: Amulticenter study.
results.text_hl: AIM: To analyze the association between chronic @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment and the development of @DISEASE_Acute_Kidney_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D058186 @@@contrast-induced acute kidney injury@@@ (@DISEASE_Acute_Kidney_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D058186 @@@CI-AKI@@@) after primary percutaneous coronary intervention (PCI) for @<m>DISEASE_ST_Elevation_Myocardial_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000072657 @@@ST segment elevation myocardial infarction@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_ST_Elevation_Myocardial_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000072657 @@@STEMI@@@).

results.title: [Metformin and left ventricular remodeling after acute myocardial infarction: molecular mechanisms and clinical implications].
results.text_hl: In @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_ST_Elevation_Myocardial_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000072657 @@@ST-@@@elevation @DISEASE_Myocardial_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D009203 @@@myocardial infarction@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_ST_Elevation_Myocardial_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000072657 @@@STEMI@@@), retrospective analyses showed that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ is associated with reduced @DISEASE_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D007238 @@@infarct@@@ size as compared to non-@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@-based strategies, implicating beneficial effects beyond @CHEMICAL_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005947 @@@glucose@@@ control.

citations.NLM: Paneni F, Costantino S, Cosentino F. [Metformin and left ventricular remodeling after acute myocardial infarction: molecular mechanisms and clinical implications]. G Ital Cardiol (Rome). 2015 Apr;16(4):225-31. PMID: 25959758
citations.BibTeX: @article{25959758, title={[Metformin and left ventricular remodeling after acute myocardial infarction: molecular mechanisms and clinical implications].}, author={Paneni F and Costantino S and Cosentino F}, journal={G Ital Cardiol (Rome)}, volume={16}, number={4}, pages={225-31}}

results.title: Effect of Metformin on Renal Function After Primary Percutaneous Coronary Intervention in Patients Without Diabetes Presenting with ST-elevation Myocardial Infarction: Data from the GIPS-III Trial
results.text_hl: The association between @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ use and renal function needs further to be elucidated since data are insufficient whether @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ affects renal function in higher risk populations such as after @<m>DISEASE_ST_Elevation_Myocardial_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000072657 @@@ST-elevation myocardial infarction@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_ST_Elevation_Myocardial_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000072657 @@@STEMI@@@).

citations.NLM: Posma RA, Lexis CP, Lipsic E, Nijsten MW, Damman K, Touw DJ, van Veldhuisen DJ, van der Harst P, van der Horst IC.
